Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.9 Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaduka » 10.9.3 Paccayavāra » 10.9.3.2 Paccayapaccanīya
10.9.3.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Mahantaraduka
Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaduka
Paccayavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
294.
3044Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Evaṃ nava pañhā kātabbā. Paccayavāre pañcaviññāṇampi kātabbaṃ, tīṇiyeva moho.)
